name: Beyond This World
description:
This was a game created by me and my girlfriend for the bite-sized horror game jam, it was created in a week.

Sorry for the terrible sound direction we're both totally new to it :p

Controls:

A and D - move left and right
Space  - Jump
Q - Switch worlds
E - Use levers

Feel free to leave any criticism in the comments we are always looking to improve!!

And most of all I hope you have at least a little fun playing this game
